abstract: Death certificate issued for former Apple chief executive Steven P Jobs says he died at home of respiratory arrest caused by a pancreatic tumor.
snippet: The death certificate for Steven P. Jobs says he died at home of respiratory arrest caused by a pancreatic tumor.
lead_paragraph: The death certificate for Steven P. Jobs says he died at home of respiratory arrest caused by a pancreatic tumor.

headline.main: Jobs’s Cause of Death Is Released by Coroner
headline.print_headline: Coroner Gives Cause of Death For Steve Jobs
headline.seo: Steve Jobs’s Cause of Death Is Released by Coroner
